248378:
I saw you on the street today
You didn't bother to look my way
Your life so perfect, all so right
Didn't have my views in sight

You look at me
You see me
You try to understand
...

What's your
Problem, you'll never say
Problem, why you act this way
Problem, or do what you do
Problem, they say you're a fool

Given up on life
Never listen to what's right
...

Hatred and destruction, it seems so cruel
Don't wanna be a part of it or be like you
You wear a swastika to shock and offend
It's become so passive, just another trend

...

I'm running now with both eyes closed
I never look to fend off blows
Can't see behind me, I can't see ahead
Sometimes I think I'm better off dead

...
